protocol_name: Assign taxonomy to gene calls using Centrifuge
protocol_name_html: Assign taxonomy to gene calls using Centrifuge
description: Uses a custom Centrifuge pipeline to assign taxonomy to gene calls.

source_data.description: Log into the HPC
Move into your class directory.

components.data: Clone the Centrifuge github repository into your class directory on the HPC.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Clone the Centrifuge github repository into your class directory on the HPC.
Move into the Centrifuge directory.

components.data: Edit the config.sh file to include the correct variable declarations. The following steps will detail how the config.sh file should be edited.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Edit the config.sh file to include the correct variable declarations. The following steps will detail how the config.sh file should be edited.
export CENT_DB="/rsgrps/bh_class/b_compressed+h+v/b_compressed+h+v"
export FASTA_DIR='/rsgrps/bh_class/username/anvio-genes'

source_data.thread_title: Annotation on step 7 of Assign taxonomy to gene calls using Centrifuge
source_data.protocol_name: Assign taxonomy to gene calls using Centrifuge
source_data.protocol_name_html: Assign taxonomy to gene calls using Centrifuge
source_data.annotation: FASTA_DIR should point to the directory containing your nucleotides.fna file generated from step 2 and transfered to the anvio-genes directory.
source_data.thread_text: FASTA_DIR should point to the directory containing your nucleotides.fna file generated from step 2 and transfered to the anvio-genes directory.
source_data.body: FASTA_DIR should point to the directory containing your nucleotides.fna file generated from step 2 and transfered to the anvio-genes directory.

source_data.description: export TYPE="single"
export FILE_EXT="fna"
export REPORT_DIR='/rsgrps/bh_class/username/anvio-genes/taxonomy/'

source_data.thread_title: Annotation on step 10 of Assign taxonomy to gene calls using Centrifuge
source_data.protocol_name: Assign taxonomy to gene calls using Centrifuge
source_data.protocol_name_html: Assign taxonomy to gene calls using Centrifuge
source_data.annotation: The program will create this directory for you. Make sure to replace username.
source_data.thread_text: The program will create this directory for you. Make sure to replace username.
source_data.body: The program will create this directory for you. Make sure to replace username.

source_data.description: export PLOT_OUT='/rsgrps/bh_class/username/anvio-genes/taxonomy/'

source_data.thread_title: Annotation on step 11 of Assign taxonomy to gene calls using Centrifuge
source_data.protocol_name: Assign taxonomy to gene calls using Centrifuge
source_data.protocol_name_html: Assign taxonomy to gene calls using Centrifuge
source_data.annotation: Same as REPORT_DIR but make sure to include the trailing / as stated in the config.sh file.
source_data.thread_text: Same as REPORT_DIR but make sure to include the trailing / as stated in the config.sh file.
source_data.body: Same as REPORT_DIR but make sure to include the trailing / as stated in the config.sh file.

components.data:
These should be named according to what sample your working with. For example, ocean data may name these:

 

export PLOT_FILE='ocean_depth'

export PLOT_TITLE='ocean_depth'
components.name: Description

source_data.description:
These should be named according to what sample your working with. For example, ocean data may name these:

 

export PLOT_FILE='ocean_depth'

export PLOT_TITLE='ocean_depth'

source_data.thread_title: Annotation on step 12 of Assign taxonomy to gene calls using Centrifuge
source_data.protocol_name: Assign taxonomy to gene calls using Centrifuge
source_data.protocol_name_html: Assign taxonomy to gene calls using Centrifuge
source_data.annotation:
PLOT FILE will be the file name of the bubble plot that is generated. 

 

PLOT TITLE will be the title found on the actual plot.
source_data.thread_text:
PLOT FILE will be the file name of the bubble plot that is generated. 

 

PLOT TITLE will be the title found on the actual plot.
source_data.body:
PLOT FILE will be the file name of the bubble plot that is generated. 

 

PLOT TITLE will be the title found on the actual plot.

source_data.description: export FILE_TYPE="f"

source_data.thread_title: Annotation on step 13 of Assign taxonomy to gene calls using Centrifuge
source_data.protocol_name: Assign taxonomy to gene calls using Centrifuge
source_data.protocol_name_html: Assign taxonomy to gene calls using Centrifuge
source_data.annotation: The nucleotides.fna file is in FASTA format.
source_data.thread_text: The nucleotides.fna file is in FASTA format.
source_data.body: The nucleotides.fna file is in FASTA format.

components.data:
The exclude parameter can be left blank. 

 

export EXCLUDE=""
components.name: Description

source_data.description:
The exclude parameter can be left blank. 

 

export EXCLUDE=""
Save and quit config.sh

components.data: Submit the job using the submit script found in the Centrifuge directory.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Submit the job using the submit script found in the Centrifuge directory.

components.data: Status of the job can be determined by the following command:
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Status of the job can be determined by the following command:

components.data: This program uses R packages that must be installed prior to launching the job. Load the R module.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: This program uses R packages that must be installed prior to launching the job. Load the R module.

source_data.name:
$ module load unsupported
$ module load markb/R/3.1.1

source_data.description: Launch R.
Get the "optparse" package.

source_data.thread_title: Annotation on step 11 of Assign taxonomy to gene calls using Centrifuge
source_data.protocol_name: Assign taxonomy to gene calls using Centrifuge
source_data.protocol_name_html: Assign taxonomy to gene calls using Centrifuge
source_data.annotation: Choose yes if promted to use a personal library.
source_data.thread_text: Choose yes if promted to use a personal library.
source_data.body: Choose yes if promted to use a personal library.

components.data: Get ggplot2 and plyr packages. You may be prompted to select a mirror. Any US server will work.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Get ggplot2 and plyr packages. You may be prompted to select a mirror. Any US server will work.

source_data.protocol_name: Assign taxonomy to gene calls using Centrifuge
source_data.protocol_name_html: Assign taxonomy to gene calls using Centrifuge
source_data.annotation: If you receive an error when installing the dependencies, continue with the protocol.
source_data.thread_text: If you receive an error when installing the dependencies, continue with the protocol.
source_data.body: If you receive an error when installing the dependencies, continue with the protocol.

components.data: Quit the R session. Do not save workspace image.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Quit the R session. Do not save workspace image.

components.data: Navigate to the directory on your local machine that contains the contigs.db generated during the Anvi'o protocol.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Navigate to the directory on your local machine that contains the contigs.db generated during the Anvi'o protocol.

components.data: Extract gene calls from the contigs database.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Extract gene calls from the contigs database.

source_data.thread_title: Annotation on step 2 of Assign taxonomy to gene calls using Centrifuge
source_data.protocol_name: Assign taxonomy to gene calls using Centrifuge
source_data.protocol_name_html: Assign taxonomy to gene calls using Centrifuge
source_data.annotation: Important: nucleotides.fna was generated in the prodigal protocol. HOWEVER, we will be using this version from Anvi'o for taxonomy assignment.
source_data.thread_text: Important: nucleotides.fna was generated in the prodigal protocol. HOWEVER, we will be using this version from Anvi'o for taxonomy assignment.
source_data.body: Important: nucleotides.fna was generated in the prodigal protocol. HOWEVER, we will be using this version from Anvi'o for taxonomy assignment.

source_data.thread_title: Annotation on step 2 of Assign taxonomy to gene calls using Centrifuge
source_data.protocol_name: Assign taxonomy to gene calls using Centrifuge
source_data.protocol_name_html: Assign taxonomy to gene calls using Centrifuge
source_data.annotation:
Remember windows users you must launch Anvio using docker. 

docker run --rm -v /path/to/files:/my_data -p 8080:8080 -it meren/anvio:latest
source_data.thread_text:
Remember windows users you must launch Anvio using docker. 

docker run --rm -v /path/to/files:/my_data -p 8080:8080 -it meren/anvio:latest
source_data.body:
Remember windows users you must launch Anvio using docker. 

docker run --rm -v /path/to/files:/my_data -p 8080:8080 -it meren/anvio:latest

source_data.description: Make an anvio-genes directory.

components.data: On your local machine, scp the nucleotides.fna file generated from step 2 into the newly created anvio-genes directory.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: On your local machine, scp the nucleotides.fna file generated from step 2 into the newly created anvio-genes directory.

components.data: A successful job will generate a centrifuge_report.tsv file in anvio-genes/taxonomy.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: A successful job will generate a centrifuge_report.tsv file in anvio-genes/taxonomy.
Move into the script directory.

components.data:
Edit the PBS variables in centrifuge_single_tax.sh to include the bh_class group and your email.

 

#PBS -W group_list=bh_class

#PBS -M netid@email.arizona.edu
components.name: Description

source_data.description:
Edit the PBS variables in centrifuge_single_tax.sh to include the bh_class group and your email.

 

#PBS -W group_list=bh_class

#PBS -M netid@email.arizona.edu

components.data: Save and quite centrifuge_single_tax.sh. Then move back into the main Centrifuge directory.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Save and quite centrifuge_single_tax.sh. Then move back into the main Centrifuge directory.
